# Using R with Git

*and some git suggestions* 

This is a book about R but the theme is collaboration for that we depend on git and github.   This chapter will hold links and suggestions for commits, branches, merging ,etc

See seciton 9.3 in [Chapter 9 Efficient collaboration](https://csgillespie.github.io/efficientR/collaboration.html) in The book [Efficient R programming](https://csgillespie.github.io/efficientR/) to start
